metadata.title: CVE-2023-33733 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - high
metadata.description:
Reportlab up to v3.6.12 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code viasupplying a crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-33733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-renderpm - 3.6.8-1ubuntu0.1
python3-reportlab - 3.6.8-1ubuntu0.1
python3-reportlab-accel - 3.6.8-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-reportlab package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.8-1ubuntu0.1').
